data.description:
Climb aboard, captain! Command your crew and steer your ship to find your fortune in Narrows, a game of high seas strategy and plunder!

Narrows transports players to the golden age of piracy, making you master and commander of your very own pirate ship in VR. Through the magic of the Oculus Go or Gear VR headsets and motion controllers, you can choose your own path on the high seas, customize your cannons and crew, and do battle with the royal navy, rival pirates and more. 

Narrows is the newest VR experience from Resolution Games, creators of the Gear VR and Go hits Wonderglade and Bait!

changelog.change_log:
Narrows 1.3.44500 release:
- Fixed the issue that the special voodoo was not accessible in the map

Narrows 1.3.43091 release:
- Fixed the issue that the special voodoo was not accessible in the map

Narrows 1.3 release:
- Added more storyline hints of defeating the ghost ship in the game
- Made the descriptions of certain unlock conditions more clear
- Polished the description of steer room
- Crew members will no longer be hidden behind voodoo statues
- Increased the precision of selecting rooms on the ship
- Fixed an issue where certain items would disappear from ports during re-visits. 
- Fixed an issue where you couldn’t click on your ship sometimes after leaving port
- The game will save your experience after each encounter
- Fixed an issue where you could accidentally fire your cannons when selecting a room
- The special item on the map will stand out more
- Rebalanced trades
- Rebalanced the difficulty of the first map
- You can no longer accept a trade if you can’t afford it 
- Fixed a bug where rooms would appear as “fixed” when they were still damaged

Narrows 1.2.38722 release:
- Make it possible to reenter the Port
- Fix a bug that Cursed Compass doesn't show up sometimes
